Text: les travaux de crack bien, mais je n'ai pas l'adversaire pourquoi?

Translation :

1- First install the game with Install.exe
2- Do all the games updates.
3- Put everything in the folder "Crack" to the root folder of the game.
4- Place the folder "map_sc2" in C:
5- Launch "LauncherGUI.exe" et choose the location of "map_sc2" in "Maps Folder"
6- Click on "Run Map" et have fun !

Tested on patch v0.4.0.14133


Now this crack seem to work, but you everywhere i can find reports saying "I don't have any opponents!" so yeah, i personally won't use this crack since it still needs to be fixed apparently.
